rooms.description: Art Deco styled living room with geometric patterns and rich textures, featuring a grand entrance leading to the central courtyard.
Elegant dining space adjacent to the kitchen with decorative lighting fixtures inspired by Art Deco motifs.
Functional and stylish kitchen area with modern amenities integrated into a retro Art Deco design, ensuring easy access to dining and living areas.
Dedicated two-car garage providing ample parking space and storage, designed with Art Deco inspired metal grilles and sleek finishes.
A private home office with sound insulation and natural lighting, located conveniently for both work and ease of access to the central courtyard.
Guest bathroom placed near the entrance, following Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Art Deco styled staircase connecting to upper levels, ensuring compliance with safety norms and efficient circulation.

openings.description: Grand entrance designed in Art Deco style with decorative glass panels and robust framing.
Architectural opening that connects the living area to a central courtyard providing natural light and ventilation in accordance with Vastu principles.
Dedicated access door for the two-car garage integrating seamlessly into the overall design.
